title: Enforce snake_case for variable names
description: All variable names must use snake_case (e.g., user_data, total_amount). This improves code consistency and readability.

title: All classes must use PascalCase
description: All class names must use PascalCase (e.g., UserProfile, OrderDetails). This ensures clarity in class definitions.

title: Implement error handling for all API endpoints
description: Every API endpoint must include error handling to manage exceptions and return appropriate HTTP status codes.

title: Ensure all API endpoints require authentication
description: Every API endpoint must verify user authentication before processing requests to prevent unauthorized access.

title: Limit response time for API calls to under 200ms
description: All API calls must respond within 200 milliseconds to ensure performance standards are met.

title: Require 80% test coverage for all modules
description: All code modules must have at least 80% test coverage to ensure reliability and reduce bugs.

title: Require docstrings for all public functions
description: All public functions must include a docstring that describes their purpose and parameters.
exampleViolation:
def add(a, b):
    return a + b

title: Enforce 4-space indentation
description: All code must use 4 spaces for indentation to maintain consistency across the codebase.
